item.title: Furb-Sust
item.description: In August 2018 I embarked on a project focused on developing skills for refurbishing items and improving my personal sustainability practices to reduce my and my community’s wastefulness. I designed this activity around ideas in Jane Mcgonigal’s Superbetter. item.title: It Begins Here
item.description: Welcome! This blog will document my journey through learning about plants, permaculture, gardening, herbalism, candle-making, and more. My intention is to learn a lot more about these topics and I want to share my methods of learning and what I learn on each topic to help others interested in learning about the areas. I hope that this website can serve as a reference and be a jumping off point for cool projects.
